text:
e="preserve">Karunamoy Goswami(11 March 1942 – 30 June 2017) was a Bangladeshi musicologist. In 2012, he was awarded Ekushey Padak by the Government of Bangladesh for his work to fine arts in the country. He got a Ph.D. at the University of Dhaka in 1988.
Goswami died on 30 June 2017 in Dhaka, at the age of 75.
